Summary: Metallic, Low Flying, Slow Moving, Rotating Object with Three White Lights on the Bottom Hovered Overhead
divs: Sighting Details I'm not quite sure if it was July 17th exactly.. But it was definitely in July 2010.. Honestly, I have seen three definite UFOs this year alone, I managed to catch the other two on video - but this one was more amazing than those two, in the way that this one was lower; not just lights. I could see the shape, colour, flight patterns, and even the detail on the metallic surface. It had a 'hatch' on the bottom - and Im only calling it a hatch because I can think of no other word for it.. That place where the aliens walk out on a ramp from in the movies, and also where the 'abduction ray' comes from.. Around that, were three lights, and three lines, as if seperating the craft into three seperate sections - or maybe just for design. I was sleeping in the attic which had been converted into a bedroom, in my cousins house. Both of us have trouble sleeping so I was looking out the skylight window when this event occured. It was around 4:30am (GMT)and I was staring at this object the whole time while it hovered slowly accross the night sky. As soon as this UFO came into view, I thought to myself "now there's a classic examply of a flying saucer - just like the typical interpretation" I had a camera phone right beside me, but I didnt want to miss the opportunity to watch this UFO for as long as I could. When I say "UFO" I do not mean "Unidentified Flying Object" - I mean an alien spaceship, because I only use the term 'UFO' when I know thats exactly what it is. I was happy to see it so clearly, in such detail. I have always believed in aliens, and that they are here on Earth. Recording this on my phone - where videos could not be faked, would've proved it to everybody who got to see it.. I wish I had recorded a video of this UFO passing above me, but I was too pre-occupied with watching it to even think about picking up my phone. My cousin said "what did you see?" when he saw me stare.. I replied "oh.. just a UFO.." as if it was nothing to me, but it was.. I only replied in such a way because I had seen several UFOs before, and already known of their presence. I will report the other UFOs with video foorage, and the exact time and date. I just wanted to start with this one.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Wexford
This sighting has never been favorited.
